name: Bloody Bob
description:
In the Pacific ocean, a creature dwells, eats, kills. And now it's very hungry, like he could eat the whole world. Help Bob in his endeavour, he need to eat every ten seconds!

Controls:
---------
-Press Space for Dash
-Move using Cursor Keys or ASWD

Team:
-----
-Lady Cerberus (Artist)
-Algerator (Coder)
-MALHCat (Coder)
-Zener (Coder)

Tools:
------
-Code: Flash Developer,Flash Builder, Flixer
-GFX: Photoshop, Flash
-Audio: Audacity, Autotracker

#21 funniest game in Ludum Dare 27
